quotes.text: The limits of my language mean the limits of my world.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.text: The question of whether a computer can think is no more interesting than the question of whether a submarine can swim.
quotes.author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quotes.text: It is impossible to be a mathematician without being a poet in soul.
quotes.author: Sofia Kovalevskaya

quotes.text: Science is what we understand well enough to explain to a computer. Art is everything else we do.
quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.source: Things a Computer Scientist Rarely Talks About

quotes.text: Innovation is saying no to a thousand things.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don't know.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Data is not information, information is not knowledge, knowledge is not understanding, understanding is not wisdom.
quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay
